entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-05-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Converter must return a bool when binding IsVisible property #29338
  • Initial binding fails when binding to a collection of an interface #29337
  • BindableProperty for a BindingBase property doesn't trigger PropertyChanging or PropertyChanged #29336
  • OnIdiom<GridLength> throws an not implemented Exception (in GridLengthTypeConverter) #29334
  • [iOS] NavigationRenderer calls base PopViewController in some areas #29329
  • [Android] Button with shadow broken on Android device #29325
  • [iOS] - CollectionView V2 layout problem #29324
  • Enhance diagnostic experience for Maui #29319
  • [iOS] - CarouselView Position and IndicatorView Not Updating When Moving to Next Item in CV2 #29312
  • [iOS] - CarouselView Items Not Displaying in CV2 #29310
  • [iOS] - CarouselView Position Not Respected When Changing From Hidden to Visible in CV2 #29309
  • [iOS] - CarouselView Throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException Immediately on Application Launch in CV2 #29308

Closed

  • Maui webview .Navigated event is not triggered #23502
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Webview events fire different on iOS and Android #21800
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [MAUI] RefreshView C4 RefreshColor is not displayed correctly on Surface when refreshing. #16973
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Shell TitleColor changes not only the color of the title, but also the color of the secondary ToolbarItem's titles #20177
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] [Scenario Day] IndicatorView using templated icons not working #7144
    .NET 9 SR7
  • DatePicker default format on iOS #27803
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Support for latest renderer in Google Map #20740
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Square brackets in WebView URL Sources result in ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND on Android #23690
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Space character in Webview's Source causes net::ERR_FILE_NOT_FOUND error #23767
    .NET 9 SR7
  • WebView in .NET MAUI fails to load URL with "&" character on Android despite URL encoding #26843
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Shell does not always raise Navigating event on Windows #12500
    .NET 9 SR7
  • How to hide the password hint which is showing when the entry is focused #17105
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [regression/7.0.0] Back button image color can't be changed #17228
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Menu item is not disappear when switch on another tab #19831
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Maui Grouped CollectionView incorrect item highlighted #22320
    .NET 9 SR7
  • Date Format property in DatePicker not working on Windows with date Format #10805
    Backlog
  • [Android][DrawImage]Under Android, canvas. DrawImage is not displayed completely #13639
  • Using DataTemplate breaks ObservableCollection binding #15147
  • [Android] Crash updating the ItemSpacing at runtime #22187
  • [Android] TapGestureRecognizer on Border doesn't work when it has shadow applied #29169
    Backlog
  • Unit Testing MAUI .net9.0 version facing manifests issue #29162
  • About the issues that arise with the use of VS2022 .NET MAUI #29178
  • Latest Visual Studio 2022 Update Appears to Reintroduce MAUI Checkbox Margin issue, but now on Windows platform where before was Anddroid #29177
  • Key is not findable in ResourceDictionary MAUI 10 #29179
  • .NET Maui iOS app now crashes every time #29185
  • My .NET Maui project has an error when consuming an Web API #29183
  • ListView in Maui Swiches Caching Strategy still one Straategy is Expicit Defined #29186
  • Broker app #29155

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Button with corner radius shadow broken on Android device - fix #29339
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • [2025/05/12] Candidate - In Flight Branch #29335
  • Android Libraries Ecosystem Updates 20250502 #29331
  • Make sure to use the override implementation of PopViewController on NavigationRenderer #29330
    community ✨
  • [tests] Add coreclr test for SF sample #29327
    area-testing
  • [.NET 10] Add "Open/Close" API to picker controls #29323
    t/enhancement ☀️, area-controls-datetimepicker, area-controls-picker
  • [Testing] Feature Matrix UITest Cases for CollectionView ItemsSource Feature #29322
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Revert "Remove InternalsVisibleTo for Toolkit" #29321
  • [iOS] Fix CarouselView proper bounce-back behavior when Loop=false #29318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for the FontImageSource color is not applied properly to the Bottom Tab Icon #29317
    p/0, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, partner/android, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR8
  • Fix -[iOS] - CarouselView Throws ArgumentOutOfRangeException Immediately on Application Launch in CV2 #29316
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Update failing CarouselView2 tests to use CarouselView1 in sample #29315
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [NET10.0] Annotate converters for nullability 3/n #29314
    community ✨
  • Fix: Picker selects incorrect item after item removal #29313
    community ✨, area-controls-picker, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [GitHub] Update breaking change tag to PMs #29326
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS]Fix: FlyoutPage memory leak #28769
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, memory-leak 💦, .NET 9 SR7
  • Re-enabled flaky UI test TextInEditorShouldScroll #29167
    area-testing, community ✨, testing-flakiness, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for CarouselView IsSwipeEnabled=False Prevents Visual Navigation #29286
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Updated

  • [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29210
    p/0, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Fix: Prevent Duplicate MapSource Invocations on setting Image's Source to Local File Paths #28405
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨, t/perf, .NET 9 SR8
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-drawing, .NET 9 SR8
  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [2025/05/03] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [DO NOT MERGE][net10.0] 20250414 net10.0 ecosytem updates #28997
  • [iOS] Fix: ActivityIndicator IsRunning ignores IsVisible when set to true #28983
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator
  • Fixed Label text cropping when a width request is specified on the label inside a VerticalStackLayout with specified with request #29166
    community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed TransformProperties issue when a wrapper view is present #29228
    area-animation, platform/android 🤖, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar Black Background Issue When Setting Transparent Background #29225
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for ImagePaint Not rendering in View #29205
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Incorrect Window.Y and Window.Height values when closing a maximized window #29253
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Fix for Flyout title is not broken over multiple lines when you rotate your screen. #29171
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-flyout, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Assigning null to the SelectedItem of the CollectionView in the SelectionChanged event does not clear the selection #29288
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Remove Compatibility.Layout as a subclass of all modern .NET MAUI controls #29281
    t/breaking 💥, area-layout, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Expose DispatcherExtensions so it could be used outside of Maui as well #29259
    community ✨
  • Fix for First Item in CollectionView Overlaps in FlyoutPage.Flyout on iOS #29265
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView EmptyView display when filtering to zero items #29247
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
